text: pasuva (adamva utpadanaya kara), adamta (bhumiyehi æti) siyaluma (vastunge) namda (evaye gunamgayanda) uganva di pasuva eva (ema) malayikavarunge idiriyehi taba, “(malayikavaruni! adamta mage niyojitaya vimata ayat sudusukamak nætæyi pævasuva noveda! mehi) oba satyavantayin nam, (menna oba idiriye æti) mevaye namayan oba ma hata dænum denu” yayi pævasuveya
